content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with Peter Schmidt.
name: Max Müller

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of an apartment.
name: Max Müller

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price.
name: Max Müller

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: If we had agreed on a final price, it would have been 600 Euro per month, as that was the last offer made by Peter Schmidt. However, I did not accept that price.
name: Max Müller

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Peter Schmidt, as a 7.
name: Max Müller

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation.
name: Max Müller

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: If I had felt discriminated or offended, it would have been due to the perception that the landlord, Peter Schmidt, was not being fair with his pricing, considering my status as a student and my budget limitations. However, I did not express such feelings during the negotiation, and I do not believe that Mr. Schmidt acted in a discriminatory or offensive manner.
name: Max Müller
